scripts.build:all: npm run build:markdown && npm run build:mdx
scripts.build: cp -r src/. dist/ && cp -rf assets dist/assets && npm run build:all && npm run copy
scripts.copy: cp -rf package.json dist && cp -rf src/README.org dist/index.org && cp -rf README.md dist
scripts.link: npm run build && cd dist && npm link
scripts.release: npm run build && cd dist && npm publish --access public
